This movie tells the story of a young man who is fascinated by the idea of a water goddess who lives at the bottom of a large pool. When he discovers that this water goddess is actually a character from a bedtime story, and that she is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect her new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

2) "Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas" (2003) directed by Tim Whitaker

This movie tells the story of a newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.
